website_summaries.verdict: Very popular maternity shapewear that covers from high waist to mid-thigh.
pros: Made with a blend of nylon and spandex, helps pregnant women feel more shapely
Seamless, breathable mesh provides gentle support and a relaxing, comfortable fit
Great for underneath dresses to prevent thigh chaffing
Easy care, wash warm, tumble dry
cons: Overwhelming majority of buyers love this shaper
A small percentage of wearers complained the pants bottoms rolled up on thigh

customer_reviews.title: Not a magical pregnancy unicorn here.
customer_reviews.text: If you are a woman like me who doesn't get the cute little bump. Who ends up looking like Bob the tomato. These are for you! I've had two c-sections with a third in my future, and I've got the deflated sad tummy as proof. These offer a gentle lift and slight compresson that feels awesome!! The fabric is ridiculously comfy! I plan on wearing these afterwards for recovery from surgery. Best purchase I've made in a very long time!!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Knodel

customer_reviews.title: Did its job!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to wear under my dress for my baby shower and any other occasions requiring a dress during pregnancy. I ordered an x-large being cautious since it’s so hard buying online sometimes. But I could have gotten away with a large. But I loved this. Wasn’t restricting at all but still gave me the shape I was looking for. I’m 5’5” currently weigh 220lbs at 26 weeks pregnant with a slight apron. Since I’ve actually lost 24lbs during pregnancy my skin is even looser under the baby bump so I was really looking for something that would hold that nice baby bump shape in my dress and this was perfect. Also great for the chub rub!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Based off of the reviews, I bought a small ...
customer_reviews.text: Based off of the reviews, I bought a small because everyone was saying it "ran large". Well I'm 5'6, 154 lbs and 4 months pregnant and this thing was tight..I have a relatively small waist and it was so tight, also squeezed my leg fat lol. Normal for me is a medium right now. I'll attach a photo of my bump and waist size for comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Annazon

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfy! I've tried on quiet a few pregnancy shapewear, and these are by the softest. They also don't squeeze your stomach too much, but they give just enough support. And, they are airy enough that you don't get major swamp crotch. I've worn them under a few dresses now, and they don't roll up on your thighs and stay put! I washed in cold water, and they didn't change shape and help up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfortable materials that smooths without restricting
customer_reviews.text: I am 16 weeks pregnant, 5'4", and I 220 pounds. I bought a large, which was perfect. These are the same idea as Spanx, but they're less restrictive. The material is softer than non maternity shapewear and was actually really comfortable. It did roll up on my legs after I stood up from lounging on the couch. But for the most part, it stayed in place and the shorts kept my legs from chaffing. They rounded my belly out and made me look more pregnant instead of just fat. I'm very pleased with these and I will be wearing them often!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie O.

customer_reviews.title: Supportive and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have this and the Spanx version. This one is more comfortable and feels more supportive. (The Spanx version, as one might expect, does a better job of taming my love handles.) But if you're in it for support and for anti-chafing, this is a great option. It does run large compared to other maternity clothes. Buy a size down, maybe even two if you want a tighter support.
customer_reviews.author: goodstuff

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I loved this body shaper while I was pregnant. I wore a lot of dresses and didn't want any panty lines or frumpiness. This shaper worked great to smooth everything out. The belly part also stretches perfectly for a growing belly. The fit was also fine (based on the sizing chart). I was 160-180 pounds during my pregnancy when I wore this and I ordered a size large, which fit great. I'm 5'3".
customer_reviews.author: Jheneya

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I purchased to wear with my baby shower dress (which is a really thin material and light pink) and you can't see any lines or bumps/lumps. When it arrived, it looked small and I was worried it would be too tight, but it really stretches and is actually very comfortable. The panel is not too constrictive and the band is not too tight. I am 5'4 and was 130 pre-pregnancy, now 30 weeks and 155. I ordered a small and it fits perfectly. I was deciding between these and the Spanx version, and I went with these due to all the positive reviews and the price. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Hall

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd bought them sooner in my pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Wish I'd bought it sooner than 32 weeks! I bought the belevation band first, then the briefs, and finally the shorts. I bought a different brand of shorts as the belevation wasn't available in my size at the time and let me tell you these are so much better. They lift my belly up so it's a nice round bump, while the other brand just smushed my belly down and it made me look odd. These are perfect for wearing under dresses in the summer to prevent chafing. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin B

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love , wish I would have gotten sooner. Turns my B belly into a D. Also gives nice belly support. Since I already was holding weight around my middle this supports the bottom. You can't really see it in the pic to well but it is thicker material around and thinner where your growing belly goes so that it can support you but still give u room to grow. My only complaint is after having for a few weeks the legs roll, and that's that I wash them after every use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stretchy & Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I am 8 months pregnant and I love these shorts. I am 250 pounds 5’4 with very thick thighs and these did not roll up on me whatsoever. It just really goes to show everyone’s body is so different as I read numerous reviews stating that these shorts rolled up on the thigh area. I ordered a Large, and even my mom said I could’ve sized down. It has an incredible amount of stretch. As for being “shape wear” I definitely think it gave me a more defined waist when I would wear my bodycon dresses. All in all it was worth my money & it deserved this review. I hope this helps a future mama :)
customer_reviews.author: Gladyscat

customer_reviews.title: Stays put and stops chafing
customer_reviews.text: A pregnancy must have for me. I have been wearing dresses almost exclusively during my pregnancy and this supports the belly and prevents inner thigh chafing. Not pregnant I'm a size 4, sometimes a 2 sometimes a 6, more of a 6 pregnant and I’ve been happy with the small so far (7.5 months in). I’m tend to be a bit thicker in the butt and thighs so I’m guessing a medium would have worked ok as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Got this to save my thighs from chub rub and totally overlooked the "shapewear" part of the description. I was a little surprised by it but turns out to be great support for the growing belly. I'm 160lbs currently, 35 weeks pregnant. 5'4" and got a size medium to get a just right/not as tight "shapewear" fit. Fabric is breathable and doesn't roll up on thighs or down on the belly. My skin is pretty sensitive to seams so by end of the day, the tighter ribbing at the top edge does bother me but not to the point where it causes a rash. Definitely recommend for mamas :)
customer_reviews.author: jadeloi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical of this when I opened the package. I thought to myself, oh great now I have to find something last minute to wear under my dress. But thankfully I tried it on and wow, it's fits perfectly!!! Doesn't hug the thighs at all!!! I am now in love! Plus it's soft material so no itching! For reference I am about a size 12/14 in pants and 7 months pregnant - the large fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Richelle

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold it all in
customer_reviews.text: This is comfortable and stays in place all night. I wore it under a dress to go out to a work party event and it provided extra support and was comfortable. I do not believe it helped smooth out any imperfections however, since you could still see the sides bulge out some. I am not a big girl either, about 140 pounds. I wish it gave more of the effect of what I was looking for. If you are looking for something to hold it all in, I would try something else instead.
customer_reviews.author: Heather E

customer_reviews.title: Zero Belly Support
customer_reviews.text: This product offered no belly support whatsoever, I was so disappointed! The material that the butt/thighs area is made out of is a firm, sturdy, suck-you-in type of material. It does an excellent job of squishing your tush. Unfortunately, the belly portion fabric is loose and flimsy, with less support than panty hose. If they could just make the belly section out of the same stuff as the thigh section, it would have been divine. After the first one came, I even ordered a size smaller in hopes of achieving some belly support. But alas, the next size down didn't hold my belly either, so they both went back.
customer_reviews.author: Katheryn

customer_reviews.title: Fit a little big
customer_reviews.text: It works. It seems a little large right now for me, but I'm currently only 18 weeks. I bought this to wear under skirts, obviously, since I will be pregnant mainly in spring and summer and I don't like chafing. I will hopefully be happier when I get bigger in the tummy. I haven't gained any weight, per se, though my stomach has obviously gotten bigger, so I don't know if this is going to fit better later or not. I need to order another, but am unsure if I should stay the same size or go down a size. I am currently a size 16 and bought a large.
customer_reviews.author: Shannah O

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I have never, ever owned any kind of shapewear before.. but I ordered this at 29 weeks pregnant to wear under my wedding dress and really any other dress since I’ve gained about 20 lbs so far and even though I’m “mostly baby”, I’m not very happy with the way my thighs and butt look right now. I’m 5’6” and currently 145 lbs and ordered a medium. I’m surprise with how well it fits and how much I actually really like it!! I would recommend this product to anyone looking to smooth things out little below the waist a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: rhub

customer_reviews.title: Nice for underpants, but not shapewear
customer_reviews.text: These actually run a little big. Prior to pregnancy, I was 5'8" and 200 lbs, and usually wore a size 16 or XXL. Right now I'm in my sixth month of pregnancy with twins, and weighed 222 lbs at my last appointment. I read the description and several reviews and decided to go with the large, which fit more like underpants than shapewear. The whole point of shapewear is to help you keep your shape, and smooth out your extra bumps and rolls, but these aren't tight enough for that. They do work nicely as underpants, though.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Love This Shapewear!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shapewear! It is so comfortable, gives my belly great support, shape and comfort. I love how it looks under skirts and dresses, it keeps my legs from chafing and is very breathable on hot summer days. I wore a 14/16 before I was pregnant and the xl fits perfect. I love it so much that I bought a second one so I don't have to wash it as often. I wear it with dresses almost everyday and it makes my baby bump look just adorable ! If your thinking about buying this do it, it's worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent maternity shapewear
customer_reviews.text: Excellent maternity shapewear! This is exactly what I was looking for to go under a formal gown that is a bit see through with the wrong undergarments. It is very comfortable even during the middle of summer. It smooths everything out and is not visible as lines. I wish I had bought this sooner! I have worn it twice under dresses since I received it 3 days ago and will get a lot more use out of it during the remainder of my pregnancy. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: EmaebeTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect even thru 3rd trimester
customer_reviews.text: Now in my third trimester, I love this shapewear so much I just bought a second one. Candidly, I call it my boulder-holder because it truly feels like it is helping hold up my belly. I usually don't like wearing skirts or dresses, but now that I have 2, I wear them all the time. It doesn't fit too tight at the top, it just fits perfect in all ways. Make sure to check the size. I usually wear XL, but with these I went with the recommended size L and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Moss

customer_reviews.title: SPANX no more!
customer_reviews.text: I should have ordered these even before I was pregnant! They are great quality and so far (I've only worn once) they haven't pilled or pulled like my regular SPANX have! They smooth out all the way up to under your bust line, don't roll down (SPANX hit me in the middle of my stomach--a trouble spot--and I would always be hoisting them back up) and have a quality feel that I believe will last. They aren't as restrictive as regular shape wear (most likely not to restrict blood flow for the baby of course) but I have been converted and I'm sure I will be wearing these non-stop!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’7 and 180 pre-preg and got the medium. It fits great with room to stretch. It def does smooth things out under tighter dresses! I’ve never worn a body con dress but I love wearing them while pregnant now. The only thing is that the thighs roll up when I sit down. So as long as I adjust before I get up or shortly after, they’ll stay down lol. I have a long torso and long thighs, and I think that’s why! It doesn’t make me hot or itchy either. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: april family

customer_reviews.title: Soft support perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: I got a Medium, I am 165lbs and 5'6 in my third trimester. perfect for under dresses or pants, gives just the right amount of support and it doesn't make you feel hot, it was exactly what I wanted I even ordered a second one in Nude. Not too tight either, but makes you feel smooth no lumps or bumps.
customer_reviews.author: Tmartin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and perfect to prevent chaffing
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I wear a size 8 to 10 pre pregnancy and a med. Is perfect. Looks tiny when you take out of the package but isn't restricting or too tight on the legs. I wear under dresses to prevent chaffing and its perfect. The shorts don't ride up at all, will probably have to order another as I get into summer since I'll be wearing dresses constantly!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Brown

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, material not that breathable/comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I went by the sizing in the description..it was really hard to tell from the reviews which size would fit me especially these things can stretch.. I am 5'2'' and 115-116 pre-pregnancy. I got the small size but found it a bit too snug/tight around the belly (thighs seemed a little tight too but not much) even at mid-late second trimester. Although it seemed fine for that time, I didn't find it too comfortable (it trapped my body heat and wasn't breathable even for the brief trial time) and didn't feel the material had enough give to work for the third trimester belly. So I returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it !!
customer_reviews.text: No . Just no . It has no form , and rolls down so eazy . I was planning on wearing it under dress but I ended up not even using it because it was so uncomfortable always rolling down and useless . I am very short so I'm not sure if that had something to do with it but it did not work out as planned you're better off buying maternity Spanx and spending the extra money at Target .
customer_reviews.author: Vela andromeda

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfy! I am 5’3” and weigh 186 lbs at 33 weeks pregnant (pre preg weight was 170) and I have thick thighs so I was worried the thigh area would be too tight but a size large fits me perfectly. I was also worried they would be too hot in the hot, humid Southern summer but the material is really lightweight and breathable. Couldn’t be happier to be able to wear my summer dresses without the chafing from my chub rub lol
customer_reviews.author: KatieK

customer_reviews.title: Love this, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Wore it under a dress for maternity photos. Super comfortable. I'm typically a size large so I ordered large in this and it was perfect. Seamless under clothing, lifted my bump slightly, and came up high enough to meet my bra line so you couldn't see a line across my belly like you can with others I have tried. Recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: lk11

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE.
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough how much I LOVE these. I've been wearing them for months now under my dresses. They do not roll down or up ever. Make me feel very comfortable with tighter dresses too! I have them in a size small and size medium and both are great and I wear them both. I went from 125 beginning of pregnancy, to about 154 and still they both work well. The price is great and you won't regret it. Skip out on the pricy ones and get these :)
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Zurcher

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this. I am curvy, with a small waist. So I didn't think it would fit my hips, thighs, and waist. And when I opened it, I definitely thought it'd only fit one leg! But, sure enough, it stretched and fit great! Covered the dimples and smoothed my sides. VERY happy! I normally wear an 18/XL. I ordered the large 14-18 and was perfect. UPDATE: after wearing this for one day, I've got a hole in the crotch region. Not happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sbgood83

customer_reviews.title: Look no further for the best pregnancy spanx
customer_reviews.text: These shapewear are wonderful! The fabric is very soft, stretchy, and incredibly comfortable. Currently 6 months pregnant and was a size 14 pants/general XL prior to pregnancy - the Large fit me perfectly with room to grow. Legs don't roll up, and there is a little support under the belly that feels wonderful. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Too big and long
customer_reviews.text: 230lbs, 5 feet 5 inches tall and 17 weeks pregnant. This is my second pregnancy so I "popped" very quickly.I have a very slight "B belly" that I was hoping to smooth over a little bit. I got a large based on other reviews and wow it's huge. It does nothing but make me feel slightly more supported. I should have gone with a medium. The legs roll up constantly and the bodice is so long I could put it over my breasts like a tube top. Definitely size down if you want more smoothing out. I feel like this is more for women who are 30+ weeks pregnant.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Rexroat

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought them sooner
customer_reviews.text: I liked these a lot more than I expected to. I bought them just to smooth out some underwear lines and smooth out my pregnant outie belly button, which they did. What I wasn’t expecting is how much back support they provided. They really helped lift my belly up a bit which was a very pleasant surprise for my back. They are much more comfortable than I thought they would be too. I wore them for an entire wedding without even noticing I had them on. My prepregnancy size was a medium and the mediums worked well for me. I ordered one in both colors.
customer_reviews.author: Riss

customer_reviews.title: A pregnancy must have!
customer_reviews.text: This is so comfortable and exactly what I needed! This shapewear isn’t too tight on my fat legs yet holds in my lovehandles and provides some back support. I wear a large at 30 weeks pregnant, 5’5” and 190lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear under a dress so that my thighs wouldn't rub together while attending a wedding/reception. At 7 months pregnant, I don't have a lot of options as to posture, and wanted a little extra bump support as well. I wish these had a little more in the way of butt shaping like my pre-pregnancy shapewear, but these do the job I bought them for. I was worried about my overall comfort with having to be dressed up for that long, but these made it feel like I was wearing comfy clothes all night.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great for chub rub and smoothing things out!
customer_reviews.text: Great shorts for chub rub and smoothing things out! My measurements put me in a size medium so I ordered those. I was not looking for a “spanx” like control though, more along the lines of comfortable shorts that stayed close and prevented chub rub without making me feel like I was being squished to death. Pregnancy is uncomfortable enough, I didn’t want shorts squeezing the life out of me. I ended up returning the medium and ordering the large, I’m glad I did! They are still form fitting but don’t feel like they’re digging into my legs at all. For reference I am 5’5, 21 weeks pregnant, and approx 170lbs in this picture. My hip measurement is about 40-41”.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Lah

customer_reviews.title: Compatible with *thicker* Women
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Im 8 months pregnant, 5'6" & 240 lbs. It was low enough on the thighs that the chub rub didn't make it roll up or slide up at all. It's super comfortable and stretchy, with just the right amount of support in the belly and the thighs. The back slid down a little the first time I was wearing it, so showed my back rolls, but if I tuck it under my bra band it doesn't do that. Edit 4 months later: I still wear this all the time! So comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tight dresses
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for wearing with tight dresses to smooth lines. Early on it also helped lift my bump so I looked pregnant rather than too many burritos. I ordered my pre-pregnancy size and still feel like I have plenty of room. Currently in the 2nd trimester so I may size up before the end of my pregnancy. Also highly recommend for summer as it has helped prevent chafing on my thighs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I tried another brand before this and it was extremely tight. This fits perfectly. Love how it has shorts and the belly band is just supportive enough and stretchy to help me through my last few weeks this summer and be able to wear dresses! Probably gonna need to order a couple more! For reference: I’m 35 weeks preg, 205lbs and I ordered a size L. Seems to still have plenty of stretch so if you are bigger or have big hips/thighs it will definitely fit you!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Medium or large?
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence between Medium and Large, I went with Meduim. I’m 5’7 and 170. These will def work, they are not too tight, they are comfy. (Maybe a large would have fit better, but who knows, maybe they would have been too big.) Overall, I’m happy with the mediums, smooths my lumps and bumps!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly uncomfortable for me.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shapewear after wearing regular nylons for a wedding and really appreciating the support. I though this product would offer similar support for my belly and a little relief. It does a nice little bit of shaping which is good for under certain shirt, dresses, and even non-maternity jeans and isn't too tight at all. But I foudn the restriction to my thighs and pelvic area makes me a lot more sore and stiff throughout the day. I wasn't expecting that at all. I'm not sure if it's the layers or just the shapewear, but I was hoping these would be something I could wear everyday, but they're just not comfortable enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen M Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I use them every time I wear a skirt or dress. They are definitely breathable and comfortable, and prevent any thigh chafing I have started getting during pregnancy. I will say that I followed other people’s recommendations for sizing, and I found them to be a bit loose on the stomach, but I am still wary in my pregnancy. There’s just little support in that area for now. I am 208lbs, 5’4”, a size 12/14 pre pregnancy, and bought the large (14/18). If I have another baby I’ll use these again, but maybe buy a medium for the early stages! I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: toni

customer_reviews.title: Best shapewear I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I've generally struggled as a curvy woman to find this type of shapewear that fits well. Often the thighs are too tight and create a bump or they roll up. These are the BEST shapewear I've ever had, period. The fact they are maternity is just a perk. The thigh fits very well and I rarely have to adjust it. I'm plus sized and having the help to smooth out my regular lumps and bumps is great, while still allowing me to show off my baby bump. I'm also looking for something that stops thigh chaffing when I'm wearing a dress or skirt. I've already got my money's worth and I'm only 23 weeks pregnant. Would totally buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cantley

customer_reviews.title: This worked great but I wish the medium I got was just ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked great but I wish the medium I got was just a smidge tighter wound the waist/hip area. I am 37 weeks pregnant and weight 155, pre-pregnancy I weighted 111. the medium was a good fit around the thighs but i would have liked to be a little bit tighter toward my hip/waist line. I loved that you couldn't see it under the tight dress I worn, it was very comfy and helped with my thighs rubbing together.
customer_reviews.author: Heather France

customer_reviews.title: Order a size smaller than what you normally wear
customer_reviews.text: 34 weeks pregnant, 5’4” & 200lbs this was very loose and would likely have fallen down had I actually worn it. The shorts part are pretty long so a dress below the knee would cover just fine. I would guess a medium would have been better but I was looking for support and these were entirely too loose, not form fitting and provided zero support. I would personally order a size smaller just to see if they were more along the lines of what I was in search of.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Necessary for Summer Pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing to help combat the dreaded 'chub rub'. It's been an extremely hot summer, and these have been a life-saver. I bought them at 35 weeks pregnant but wish I had gotten them sooner! Worth the investment though, even if just for a few weeks. The over-the-belly part isn't too hot either, which I was worried about. It's been great for wearing dresses and skirts in this weather. My thighs are now safely separated and I haven't had any chafing since I purchased these! 10/10 would recommend to any pregnant ladies out there!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia J.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Really good shape wear! I am a size 10 pants right now, so I bought the Medium and it’s a perfect fit! For even more reference, I’m 5’10” and weigh 200lbs at 8 months pregnant. It’s not too tight at all, but tight enough it’s not going anywhere. I posted a picture of a before and after... I purposefully wore underwear that are terrible with the panty lines. This should work great under dresses for the rest of my pregnancy! Wish I had purchased it earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany HooksTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great for smoothing!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought this. For size reference, I am a size 4, 135 lbs pre-pregnancy. I bought a small at 19 weeks and 142 lbs. When I pulled it out of the package, I thought there was NO way it was going to fit. However, it did and it was surprisingly comfortable. It smoothed out my underwear lines perfectly in my dress so my 20 week pictures turned out great. I am excited to wear this for additional support as I progress.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny S

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: When I was looking at ordering it I wasn’t sure what size to go with. I’m 5”0, 23 weeks pregnant, weigh about 150 pounds, and have a kinda small bump for now. But with it getting warmer I wanted something to help with the chaffing when I wore dresses. This is perfect! I got a medium because I knew I needed room to grow and I’m so glad I did! It’s soft and comfortable and the perfect length even though I’m on the shorter side. I’m so happy I got this and I might even buy the black one too!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this belly band!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these because i love them so much. It is perfect for when you are wearing any tight fitted dresses. It also keeps your legs from chaffing with is a HUGE added bonus for me. It is very comfortable and easy to move in. I do have to say though I am very hot ALL THE TIME. This summer has been BRUTAL! This is breathable but because I am such a hot box it doesn't keep me from sweating, that could definitely be due to the dresses i am wearing over this as well so don't take that as a negative because this is by far my favorite belly band to wear by far!
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I needed something to help prevent chafing while wearing skirts/dresses at 30+ weeks pregnant. Total life saver. It's comfortable, stretchy, and the perfect length down the legs - long enough to cover the chafing area but short enough that it doesn't show when wearing knee length skirts/dresses. The material is thick enough to provide support, but not too thick that it gets hot. I normally wear a size Large bottoms but ordered a Medium based on reviews and it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: kmorr00

customer_reviews.title: Good and slimming
customer_reviews.text: I like these shorts a lot. I'm 26 weeks now and have a definite belly. I had been able to get away with Skimmies (a size up) and still can, but they are starting to get too small around the belly and can't cover it. These shorts do a great job. They are not too tight on the belly and they keep your clothes skimming right over your body. They aren't really tight -- I'd say they're more "smoothing" than binding. They are definitely comfortable enough to wear all day. My one complaint is that the thighs rolls up. I have to adjust them a few times during the day. But all in all, I'll keep wearing them!
customer_reviews.author: Chiara

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pair of shapewear shorts that I've found that actually fit, are comfortable, stay in place and not noisy when I walk! They are very stretchy and not too tight. If I could change one thing, I would prefer the shorts to be a bit longer but my thighs are on the larger side. For size reference, I bought a large and I'm roughly 210lbs, 5'5 and 22 weeks pregnant and will most likely be able to wear these through the remainder of my pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: TekWho

customer_reviews.title: Being bigger my pregnant belly is rounded at the top (I carry high) but not at the bottom like the average persons would be and these give me ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size XL, I am usually a size 20/22 or 2 xl and it fits perfectly! Being bigger my pregnant belly is rounded at the top (I carry high) but not at the bottom like the average persons would be and these give me that perfect round belly look and feel very comfortable, smooth, and held together! My only complaint so far, and why I'm giving 4 stars instead of 5, is it had a very strong chemical like odor when I took them out of the package and tried them on.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor w.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: 7 months pregnant, i find dresses are much more comfortable so this item is sooo helpful with fitted dresses. Its comfortable but just tight enough to provide belly support and help hide some side bulge and panty lines. It is a little tighter on my thighs and you can see the thigh hem through the dress if its tight enough. I still wear it and feel very comfortable in it. Im 200 lbs. 5’4” and originally a large pre pregnancy with large thighs. I got a large, fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Leyva

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but the seams are quite thick on the legs ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but the seams are quite thick on the legs and can be seen through many of my dresses. Offers enough shaping to be worth the purchase. (See photo - shows seams slightly through dress but does the job)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Schwindt

customer_reviews.title: Favorite maternity product
customer_reviews.text: These were probably my favorite pregnancy purchase. They are super comfortable and do not roll down. They are THIGH SAVERS. Wearing maternity dresses was impossible prior to buying this. On days when I'm lounging around the house and just want to wear "shorts" and a t-shirt... I will just wear these and a t-shirt and it is so comfortable. I've been wearing them since my second trimester and I am now 35 weeks and still wear them often.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Mispackaged - double check your order!
customer_reviews.text: These were packaged incorrectly. I ordered a size large which should fit sizes 12-16. The package says size large. I washed them and put them on assuming they would be a perfect fit. They are huge. I initially thought I ordered the wrong size as the tag label on the garment says 18-20 which is an XL. However, my order history and the package say size L. I'm seriously disappointed as I needed the support and this product isn't cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I wear Jockey slip shorts usually under dresses due to the fact that my thighs rub. I needed something different now that I am 28 weeks pregnant. I wear pants size 16/18 and the large fit perfectly. These had a little bit of support but weren’t tight on my belly and the legs did not ride up at all through the night (dancing all night at a wedding!). Very very happy and plan to purchase another pair
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M Pytlik

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I got myself a size XL because I wanted to be comfortable and on the safe side but pre pregnancy I’m a size 16 so after getting the XL I realized I should have gotten a size L. They are still very comfortable I just wanted more support on my belly. I would give 5 stars but I didn’t get my right size so I can’t give an accurate review.
customer_reviews.author: suzette

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price, fits amazingly
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated in ordering because i was worried it would be too tight. I am a size 18 and 8 months pregnant. Got the biggest size and it’s excellent. Bought this to go under my baby shower dress and it’s PERFECT and lifted my belly SO MUCH. Only regret is that I haven’t had this my whole pregnancy. DEFINITELY should have ordered this months ago. Going to use it under my dress for maternity pictures too, and as often as possible until delivery. Very comfortable, doesn’t feel like you’re wearing shapewear, not tight on your belly but DOES lift like it needs to.
customer_reviews.author: Lorin Rae

customer_reviews.title: Size down.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some support, i can not wear the maternity belt bc my baby is too low. I wanted support for my belly because my core muscles are so weak (even before pregnancy). I started to see slight stretch marks at 8 months pregnant...and i figure adding support will hold off in the strengthing of my skin. Size down if you want the support, my baby still has a lot if room....since the belly part is veryyyy stretchy! Worth the buy, especially to wear under my scrubs or under maxi dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tight maternity dresses!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and true to size. Used under my maternity dress that squeezed every curve that made me feel like the love handles were smoothed out and didn’t have that awkward grand canyon belly button look when wearing a tight dress/shirt while pregnant. I am 7.5 months, 170 lbs and 5’8, medium fit perfect. Not too tight around the belly like typical spandex. Leg length went to mid thigh, did not ride up and waist did not fall down. Highly recommend, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: Very stretchy
customer_reviews.text: I was a size 14 before pregnancy and I’m at 34 weeks. I wanted something that would just help lift a bit and hide some love handles when wearing a dress in my maternity photos. This does the job. I probably could’ve gone with a medium but I’ve been very sensitive about tight things on my belly so I went with a large. They definitely aren’t spanx (which is good) so if you’re looking for more control size down.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent find for a plus size pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great find in the world of maternity support. It is near impossible to find anything for a plus size pregnancy. These stretch nicely and give really great support. It relieves the pressure on my bladder! I’m wearing to my baby shower and I’m sure I will be comfortable through the party. I agree with another reviewer about giving a nice shape to your belly. I’ve purchased and returned many products like these. Not this one. I will keep for future pregnancies.
customer_reviews.author: Hiroshi Miyazawa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and Non-Restrictive
customer_reviews.text: I always use some type of this sort of short under dresses in the summer. I am 16 weeks pregnant and my normal ones just didn't feel good anymore (made me hot and nauseous because they were tight and baby just don't like that). The reviews for this were amazing, so I decided to try it out. I purchased a medium (which is the pre-pregnancy size). I love how they fit and feel. I am hoping they have non-maternity so I can order a pair for next summer! If you want help not chaffing--get these! It will also help smooth any little love handles too :)
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: LIFE SAVER
customer_reviews.text: I wish i would have bought multiple of these in the mid stage of my pregnancy. my third trimester has fallen on the hottest summer months (110 daily in the desert) & the only comfortable airy thing to wear is dresses. you can't even tell you have this on & it gives your bump such a beautiful shape. I am a girl who is on the cheaper side, but if i would of known earlier in my pregnancy how handy this would have been i would have easily bought 3-6 of these. i purchased for a late maternity shoot & have been washing this thing every other day with my last few weeks
customer_reviews.author: Erika Zarabia

customer_reviews.title: Fits great.. Just not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I want to start off by saying this product fit true to size and it was very comfortable. I’m 20 weeks pregnant and ordered a size large. Although comfortable, this product did not help smooth me out.. at all. I looked exactly the same in my dress whether I had this product on or not. I’m trying to achieve a “I’m pregnant” look and not a “I ate too much” look. I really only wanted this product to suck in my love handles on my sides a bit, but this did not do that. I ordered a medium now thinking that if it’s a bit smaller maybe it’ll hold me in better. Stay tuned...
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction to material, developed bad dashing after one wear.
customer_reviews.text: If I could srill return I would. Received and it fit perfect. Washed before wearing. However, wore once and developed a really bad rash all over my thighs :(. Washed again and decided to try it one more time. And to my disappointment the rash returned. It’s painful and takes days to go away. I must be allergic to the material. Again wish I could return as I won’t be using anymore due to allergic reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Angela May

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to go under dresses for work. They are comfortable to wear and stay in place for the most part. I have thicker legs so they do squeeze just a little bit, but that is common with this style of shapewear for me. The legs did not ride up and the top did not roll down which was great. I feel like the crotch sagged just a bit, but it didn't bother me much. For reference I am currently 21 weeks, 5'4", 170 lbs and curvy and purchased a medium.
customer_reviews.author: ssmith0320

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE! 🙌🏼
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but had to for this one. My baby shower dress is a maxi and the material is soft and clingy. I’m 5’5 and I wear size 16 jeans and L/XL tops. I HAVE VERY WIDE HIPS AND BIG THIGHS. The size Large fits me like a dream! Super comfortable, goes over my bump perfectly and fits my thighs great. I have cellulite and you can’t see one but of it. ORDER THESE! THEY ARE WORTH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Great support - suffering from RL pain
customer_reviews.text: Never had underwear for pregnancies - this will be my 3rd child and since has been quite a while from my last baby - normal panties will no do it, they are just uncomfortable and even painful. With this piece I'm able to move better, they cover my whole back and belly (I will be using a belt as well - I'm experiencing round ligament pain) providing security when using clothes that are tight - they do not roll up on my leg, easy when using the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana P.

customer_reviews.title: Summer Pregnancy Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these undershorts! True to size, not too tight but perfect for smoothing and medium support. I wear mine underneath dresses and they are so comfortable. I love how high up they go to smooth back rolls and high enough that it doesn’t cut into my bump (38 weeks now). The shorts go down far enough to prevent chafing, and there’s extra support right where you need it at the bottom of your bump! Fantastic product, definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this almost daily with several of my maternity dresses! I have also worn it with fancier dresses to two separate weddings. It provides support, and helps shape without being too cumbersome. I also feel that it helps with some of this awful chaffing that I am new to experiencing with this pregnancy. It does not get too hot, as can also be an issue while pregnant. I highly recommend. If it helps, I am 5'3 and currently weight 195lbs. I am 38 weeks pregnant and ordered a medium! It still fits great!!! Originally, I chose this one because of the price, and the reviews. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I was a little worried about it being poor quality but I absolutely love this! I got a size Medium. Looking at it right out of the bag, I was worried because it looked quite small and I need this for my baby shower in a few weeks. But it stretched and fits PERFECTLY! Not too snug but not loose either. I'll update this review with some photos later. I bought a Medium, 28 weeks pregnant, 178lbs, lots of baby!
customer_reviews.author: Senci123

customer_reviews.title: I actually look pregnant now!
customer_reviews.text: As a pregnant obese woman, I was a little upset that I didn't have that cute bump everyone else has. This shaper gave me that cute bump I was looking for, and provided some nice support. Great for preventing thigh chafing too.
customer_reviews.author: jolacey

customer_reviews.title: Fit great and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These spanks are perfect for wearing under dresses! They aren't too tight or constricting so they aren't uncomfortable. They are great for helping hold the baby belly up and rounding it a little. Very lightweight so they are still comfortable to wear in warm weather. They also tend to stay right in place, I don't have to constantly adjust them. Pre pregnancy I am normally an 18-20 size, so I ordered the XL/20-26 size. This size fit me perfect and the next size down would probably be too small.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Earle

customer_reviews.title: Good to have
customer_reviews.text: They’re kind of stale feeling when getting out of the package. I tried them on immediately but washed them before actually wearing them out and the wash helped loosen them up a little so they don’t feel so stale anymore lol. I’m a large so i ordered a large but they do feel a little tight. I’m not so sure if i should have gone for an xl bc it’s not so tight where i’m uncomfortable? Idk how to explain sorry
customer_reviews.author: katt

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so comfortable I forgot I was wearing it! This is my second pregnancy so not everything is as tight in the belly, but this made me look fantastic and supported! I was concerned it wouldn't fit over the entire belly due to their model photos but it's so stretchy without digging in and fit over my belly. All the way up to my bra. I'm 5'7", 32 weeks pregnant, and 220lbs. Also, I have an umbilical hernia and this really kept me comfortable which is hard to do because of the hernia. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: woodsfam17

customer_reviews.title: You need these!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! I purchased them In black, I love them so much I’m going to get the tan/nude ones next! They’re a little on the thicker side though they’re still breathable. They don’t ride up on your legs and they go up on my abdomen. I’m 5’6 and I typically wear a large or xl. The large fits great! I’m 5 months pregnant and there is room for my belly to grow! It’s stretch in all the right places. A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: VanessaC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Does not offer much for support, which is fine because that's not what I was looking for. I was looking for a product to wear under maxi skirts during these warmer pregnancy months that would high panty lines and protect from thigh rub; product delivered exactly what I was looking for. Also, very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Pchamp

customer_reviews.title: Good material
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these shorts is good. So far I have only wore them 3 times and they seem to be still be in good shape. The part that goes over the belly is not too thin. It is all overall good material. The material is thin enough to wear under tight clothing but not to thick to be noticeable. They are a bit pricy so I am hoping they last a while. But they were worth the purchase because they help shape my belly a little better when I wear fitted dresses. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!!! Buying things using my pre-pregnancy pant size always scares me, but I held my breath and ordered. Right now, I’m 6 months pregnant and 165 lbs and ordered a medium. When I first unpackaged these I thought no way in hell are those things going to fit, but omg they are soo stretchy and just slide right on! I love how they give you some support, but also smooth everything, which was exactly what I was looking for! They are so light and breathable..perfect for under dresses even during these summer months! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: If you’re thinking about buying this just do it. I was on the fence but I loved it. It provides support and it also helps shape your belly really cute. I’m not sure how to explain it but my belly is a little more oval looking like an egg but this shareware helped round it off without it being too tight or uncomfortable!!! I am currently 6 months. Pre pregnancy weight 135lbs currently 150lbs. I just straight love this item.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Must-Have for Pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver throughout most of my pregnancy. I have found that a lot of maternity skirts and dresses have thin material - even the more expensive options at Seraphine, Pea in the Pod, etc. This shapewear camouflaged underwear lines, bulges, etc. and prevented chafing in the sweltering summer heat. My one bit of advice is to order big if you think your belly might be massive in your third trimester. I still use mine but I’ve had to fold the top down in the last few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Pamplemousse

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Medium fits me perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Update: I’m 10 weeks postpartum, around 160 lb, and still wearing this with every skirt and dress. I’m about to go back to work and it will be a huge help to feeling good in my clothes. Definitely recommend! I ordered this and just tried it on. I’m always nervous about ordering clothes online but this seems to fit perfectly. I’m 5’4” and pre-pregnancy was about 135 pounds. Im 23 weeks along and ordered a medium. I don’t have super skinny legs and would have not done well in a small. Medium is just right. Seems like it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Not the highest quality but seeing as I'm only pregnant for 9 months it'll serve it's purpose. I have noticed some discoloring on the fabric and it just seems like it would fall apart with more frequent/longer wear. Things I've LOVED, it's really comfortable and not too terribly hot. It doesn't show through even through the tightest of clothing and smooths out any major lumps/bumps. Would recommend for short term wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Cook

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Pregnancy Undergarment!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! This is my second pair (I ordered one in nude first) and I couldn't be happier. Really smoothes and shapes without being restrictive and hot. I even wore them on a 14 hour day that included a trip on an airplane and a wedding shower and was completely comfortable. Great under tighter fitting dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Breathable
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at 1st because I am 30 weeks pregnant and have had issues with my sacroiliac joints for about 6 weeks. These compression shorts are not too tight but help give me the extra support I need, and they are awesome to wear under a dress that might be a little see through on the bottom. I am buying another pair and have made these part of my everyday essentials. I am normally a size 8-10 prepregnancy, but sized up to a large and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: SO COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: SO COMFORTABLE. I seriously can’t recommend this enough. So much support for my growing belly. Before pregnancy I was 250, 5’9 and wore a 16/18. I’m 7 months pregnant and still have plenty of room to grow. I ordered a size large and they stretch so well. They aren’t tight in an uncomfortable way, they just “hug” me just right with all the right support.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shorts in what I thought was a large but it turned out to be a MEDIUM. When I noticed, I thought there would be no possible way they would fit. Well they did and they fit perfectly! I'm 26 weeks pregnant now and think I could maybe use a large at this point for my legs but the waist area is still not too tight. I definitely recommend these for anyone needing thigh relief while wearing dresses #summer
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Works well, fits somewhat small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the small and I would say it's smaller than expected. I am usually an XS, but I decided to order the small to give some extra room. The small was pretty tight. I am 5'5, 121 pounds, 3.5 months pregnant. I only have a little belly. I would say if you're 5-9 months pregnant you might want to order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Love this item!
customer_reviews.text: Now that I'm pregnant I've been wearing a lot more form-fitting clothes to show off my baby bump. But I enjoy the support of shapewear to hold things in place. I was a little nervous when I first bought this because I thought it might be too tight and uncomfortable. I love this shape wear and have worn it several times already. It is very comfortable and does not squeeze me to the point where it's uncomfortable but holds everything together. I ordered a large and I am 5 7 175 lb 14 weeks pregnant. I have very big thighs so I was told to order a large so it wouldn't dig in and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable than Spanx - perfect for pregnancy!
customer_reviews.text: These were super comfortable. Don’t expect them to give you a “perfect” shape, though. They’re not as tight as spanx (obviously - since you don’t want something that tight around your growing belly!) so it won’t hide any “bulges.” I like how they smoothed out my thighs and hid any dimples that would otherwise be noticeable in a tight dress. As far as sizing, I’m 5’7”, 160 pounds at 34 weeks (140 pre pregnancy) and the small fit perfectly. I’m usually a medium in everything else so I’m glad I paid attention to their sizing chart and got a size down.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Best Maternity Purchase Ever
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 16 and I got the large. Single best thing I bought during pregnancy. Totally rounds out a belly and if you have a tiny bit extra fat it hides it wonderfully and takes away a B shaped belly.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: I wish i bought these sooner!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Unfortunately I'm 32 weeks so only have a few more weeks of use, they would have been great earlier in the summer. I've always been hesitant buying shaping garments because I feel they move your extra squish places you don't want it to. But these are thin enough they keep any extra bumps hidden while not squishing extra fat and skin out the edges. I'm 5'8" and 195# at 32 weeks, i bought the L. I would have normally gone for the XL but reading other reviews it sounded like the L would fit fine and they do. I highly recommend. They make wearing dresses very comfortable. Even keeping the rubbing between my thighs comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Tava Kline

customer_reviews.title: LOVED it so much I bought another!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these! I bought one just to see if it was a good fit for me. I like to wear dresses and finding something to wear underneath that isn’t underwear is hard😂. Well this shapewear is amazing. The material is stretchy, not to tight and just enough elasticity wear it hugs the tummy but doesn’t sufficoate haha. I can wear under jeans and leggings, however it’s not a seamless look... if your looking for comfort these are are it!
customer_reviews.author: the unapologetic mom

customer_reviews.title: Just enough support to be comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter-in-law, for later in pregnancy and she was very uncomfortable with a large baby(boy!) The doctor suggested some type of support, so I ordered this and another belt type option, but this was the one she kept! This one gave her the support she needed and got her through to the birth of our grandson! It saved the day!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria A. Bogdan

product_meta.title: Belevation Pettipant: Maternity Shapewear, High Waisted Mid-Thigh Pregnancy Underwear
feature_bullets: A Blend of Nylon, Spandex and Supima Cotton
Seamless, breathable mesh Mid-Thigh PettiPant Maternity Shaper
With New Absorbent Comfortable Cotton Gusset. Sizes 0-26
A Blend of Nylon, Spandex and Supima Cotton. Made in America
Engineered to prevent thigh chaffing .Perfect under dresses
High waisted maternity support shapewear underwear
